remarks: The set of all walks as words of length 0 is the set of all words of length 1 over the verices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Jul-2018.)
statement:
wwlkn0s $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) -> ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` 0 ) = { w e. Word V | ( # ` w ) = 1 } ) $.
$d E w $.
$d V w $.
$d X w $.
$d Y w $.
